Summary of evidence
Two community-based studies (Society for Education Action and Research in Community 
Health – SEARCH, and Project to Advance the Health of Newborns and Mothers – 
PROJAHNMO 2) (66,67) evaluated algorithms used by CHWs in routine home visit 
interventions. The gold standard in the SEARCH study (in Gadchiroli, India) was physician-
coded sepsis deaths. The PROJAHNMO-2 study (in Mirzapur, India) used physician-
